name: Burn the Trees VR
description:
Help out the island by burning the dead trees.

(For the Vive summer game jam)

Thanks for taking the time to try out the game! Let me know what you think or if you want more in the comments below, or message me for email.

Assets used:

  • VRTK - SteamVR Unity Toolkit
  • Lowpoly 3d worlds
  • Lowpoly substances
